regen.absent_element: the scenario when no subsequent scheduled setting exists after a manual setting
regen.new_specification: A manual setting shall revert to a predefined default temperature if no subsequent scheduled setting exists after the current scheduled ends.
The system shall notify the user when a manual temperature setting is overridden by a scheduled setting.

regen.absent_element: notification when manual setting reverts to default
regen.new_specification: The system should notify the user when the manual setting has been deactivated and the default is restored.

label: When a manual temperature setting ends, the default setting will be used for the next time period.
absence: using the default setting after a manual temperature setting ends
